PERSONA:
meet elizabeth, a 67-year-old widowed woman living in a metropolitan area in the northeast region of the united states. she is a white non-hispanic american who was born and raised in the country. elizabeth completed some college education but did not obtain a degree. 

she identifies as a protestant christian, attending religious services a few times a year. her political views align with the liberal ideology, and she is a registered democrat voter. elizabeth comes from a middle-income family, earning between $30,000 and $40,000 annually.

despite being in her late 60s, elizabeth embraces technology and uses the internet several times a week. she is an active member of her community, participating in voluntary work regularly. elizabeth leads a fulfilling life, cherishing her independence and staying engaged with her interests and social circles.
